value.title: Adding Pre Calculated Rank in Power BI Using Power Query

value.title: Age Calculation in Power BI using Power Query
value.excerpt: Power Query has a simple way of calculating the age. However, because DAX is the popular language in many calculations in Power BI, many are not aware of this function in Power Query. value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
